Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.ssdd.simulation.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Thread
    Behaviour of a process in critical section test simulation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Behaviour to be executed as a independient Thread. For IConstants.SIMULATION_NUM_ITERATIONS times sleep during a random interval of time simulating a calulation. Then try acces to critical section.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • enterCriticalSection

        private void enterCriticalSection()
        Enteres in critical section, logs it with a SimulationLog, sleeps during a random interval of time, and then logs the out of critical section again. At last, releases the critical section.

      • simulateSleep

        private void simulateSleep(long min,
                           long max)
        Simulates a sleep between an interval of min and max.
        Parameters:
        min - minimun time to sleep
        max - maximum time to sleep
